chapters.title: Chapter 14:  What Wise Ones Know
chapters.info:
Millis Fendry,
      p. 338 (403)—Innkeeper at
      the Hoop and Arrow, an inn in Caemlyn.
      Master Harnder, the Second Librarian,
      claims to have a weakness for her ale.  She keeps pigeons, however,
      and sends one of them north every time he visits.
      She also received three hooded guests, who were reported to be Brown
      Aes Sedai, behind closed doors for over an hour—this leads
      Mistress Harfor to believe that Harnder and Fendry
      are both spies for the Brown Ajah.
